# Alces 
Blocks will no longer lose their display name and lore when placed.



[![Modrinth Downloads](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/cIidVvzw?logo=modrinth&logoSize=auto&labelColor=%2316181c&color=%2300af5c)](https://modrinth.com/plugin/alces "Modrinth")
